name: PostBattle_PreAlpha_Tutorial
journelText:
Congradulations you have beaten your first battle and thus finished the pre-alpha's tutorial. The nodes ahead are encounters similar to what will be found in the final game. Here is a gift of dark energy and ammo to get your started. Good luck out there and thanks for playing. [EFFECT](ADD_ENERGY){100} [EFFECT](ADD_AMMO){20} 
[BUTTON](EXIT){Move on}
